lines.text:
[after being locked in a cool room]
I never thought we'd end up like this, Tess. Of course, you realise I wouldn't do this for Thorne.
Maybe he's a drag queen ... or a rock star. Mick Jagger wears makeup ... he looks dead.
Put on that little smile of yours and get your own way?

[to Tessa]
Just because you and Steve work well together, don't expect anyone else to appreciate it. If Thorne thinks his rationalisation of assets is working, he'll have you all flying solo.
